title: 23S rRNA (guanine2535-N1)-methyltransferase
text:
23S rRNA (guanine2535-N1)-methyltransferase (, "AviRa") is an <a href="enzyme">enzyme</a> with <a href="List%20of%20enzymes">systematic name</a> "S-adenosyl-L-methionine:23S rRNA (guanine2535-N1)-methyltransferase". This enzyme <a href="catalysis">catalyses</a> the following <a href="chemical%20reaction">chemical reaction</a>
This is one of the <a href="methyltransferase">methyltransferase</a>s from "<a href="Streptomyces%20viridochromogenes">Streptomyces viridochromogenes</a>" . "<a href="Streptomyces%20viridochromogenes">Streptomyces viridochromogenes</a>" produces the <a href="antibiotic">antibiotic</a> <a href="avilamycin%20A">avilamycin A</a> which binds to the <a href="50S">50S ribosomal subunit</a> to inhibit <a href="protein%20synthesis">protein synthesis</a>.
